descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
[media]
# Discover the magic of VR with Moss, a timeless adventure game starring a tiny hero with a big heart. (Now updated for Quest 3/3S!)

Moss is an action-adventure puzzle game handcrafted for comfortable VR play, combining components of classic gameplay—compelling characters, environmental puzzle-solving, and captivating world exploration. 

[media]
Dear Reader, Meet Quill...a young mouse with dreams of greatness beyond the confines of her settlement. When an ancient magic is awakened, Quill must embark on an epic journey—and she needs you there by her side. Together, you'll explore forgotten realms, solve cleverly-designed puzzles, and battle arcane enemies, all within a storybook world brimming with myth and magic. 

[media]

# Experience a Living Fairy Tale
- **Unbreakable Bond:** Forms a unique bond with Quill
- **Hand-crafted Dioramas:** Explore breathtaking miniature spaces
- **An Interactive World:** Reach in to loot, solve puzzles, and battle
- **Comfortable for Everyone:** Fixed perspective and zero motion
- **Hidden Secrets:** Uncover collectible scrolls and surprises
- **Photo Mode:** Compose & capture special moments with Quill

[media]
“breathlessly inventive” - VICE

“A small step for a mouse, a giant leap for VR” - Polygon 

"If you prefer a laid-back puzzler, I highly recommend Moss and Moss 2." - Machable


Localization: Voice, Subtitles, and User Interface: English, German, French, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified/Traditional); Subtitles and User Interface: Korean, Spanish, Italian)
